tool.name: OGS: checkMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'checkMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; checkMesh $validation $print_properties $mesh_file.element_identifier

param.name: print_properties
param.label: print properties
param.help: print properties stored in the mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **checkMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
